foodItems.name: Pad Thai
foodItems.description: A famous Thai stir-fried noodle dish with shrimp, tofu, bean sprouts, and peanuts in a sweet and tangy sauce.

foodItems.name: Green Curry
foodItems.description: A Thai curry made with coconut milk, green curry paste, vegetables, and a choice of meat. Served with steamed rice.

foodItems.name: Tom Yum Soup
foodItems.description: A hot and sour Thai soup with shrimp, mushrooms, lemongrass, and Thai herbs. A flavorful and aromatic soup.

foodItems.name: Pad See Ew
foodItems.description: Stir-fried wide rice noodles with broccoli, egg, and a choice of meat in a sweet soy sauce.

foodItems.name: Red Curry
foodItems.description: A Thai curry made with coconut milk, red curry paste, bell peppers, bamboo shoots, and a choice of meat. Served with steamed rice.

foodItems.name: Som Tum (Papaya Salad)
foodItems.description: A spicy and tangy Thai salad made from shredded green papaya, chili, tomatoes, lime juice, and peanuts.

foodItems.name: Massaman Curry
foodItems.description: A rich and aromatic Thai curry with coconut milk, potatoes, peanuts, and a choice of meat. Served with steamed rice.

foodItems.name: Thai Basil Chicken
foodItems.description: Stir-fried ground chicken with Thai basil, garlic, chili, and soy sauce. Served with steamed rice and a fried egg.

foodItems.name: Coconut Soup (Tom Kha Gai)
foodItems.description: A creamy and aromatic Thai soup made with coconut milk, chicken, galangal, and kaffir lime leaves.

foodItems.name: Thai Mango Sticky Rice
foodItems.description: A popular Thai dessert made with glutinous rice, fresh mango slices, and sweet coconut cream.
